title: JAGE
introduction_and_eligibility: We're doing a survey on products used in the home.

question_1.text: Approximately how many cigarettes do you usually smoke per day?

question_2.text: What is your usual brand of cigarette?

sub_question.text: Is that the non-menthol or the menthol type?

question_3.text: How long have you been smoking cigarettes?

instructions_for_vantage: If usual brand is Vantage, go to blue questionnaire.
instructions_for_kent: If usual brand is Kent, go to white questionnaire.
